verses.name: Jeremiah 51:60
verses.text: So Jeremiah wrote in a book all the evil that should come upon Babylon, even all these words that are written against Babylon.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:61
verses.text: And Jeremiah said to Seraiah, When thou comest to Babylon, and shalt see, and shalt read all these words;

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:62
verses.text: Then shalt thou say, O Lord, thou hast spoken against this place, to cut it off, that none shall remain in it, neither man nor beast, but that it shall be desolate for ever.
